tasks.label: Format All Files
args: & { $ignoreFile = Join-Path '${workspaceFolder}' '../.clang-format-ignore'; $ignorePatterns = @('build'); if (Test-Path $ignoreFile) { $ignorePatterns += Get-Content $ignoreFile | Where-Object { $_ -match '\S' } | ForEach-Object { $_.Trim().TrimEnd('/') -replace '\.', '\.' -replace '\*', '.*' } }; $pattern = '(' + ($ignorePatterns -join '|') + ')'; Get-ChildItem -Path '${workspaceFolder}', '${workspaceFolder}/../shared' -Recurse -Include *.c,*.h,*.cpp,*.hpp | Where-Object { $_.FullName -notmatch $pattern } | ForEach-Object { Write-Host "Formatting $($_.FullName)"; clang-format -i $_.FullName } }
tasks.detail: Format all C/C++ files in the workspace and shared directory, respecting .clang-format-ignore
